name: Sokoban Game
description:
Controls: Space to restart, arrow keys to move, z to undo. That's it!

Goal: Go from sadness to happiness!

Github repository: https://github.com/TrolledWoods/stay_home

Written in the rust programming language: https://www.rust-lang.org/

Using an opengl wrapper: https://crates.io/crates/glium

Sound library: https://crates.io/crates/rodio
